small.p: Search the Villain deck for all Nine cards, shuffle them, and put them aside as the Nine deck.
Put the top H cards from the Nine deck into play
Whenever a Nine card would be destroyed, flip it instead. Whenever no villain targets are in play, the heroes win the game
The first time an Attack card would enter the trash each turn, this card deals X melee damage to each hero, where X = 2 * the number of powers contolled by that hero.
The first time a Special card would enter the trash each turn, play the top card of the villain deck

back.text: Whenever a hero uses a power, this card deals that hero 1 melee damage

text.p: The first time a Defence card would enter the trash each turn, each villain target regains 2 HP.
The first time a Special card would enter the trash each turn, this card deals 2 toxic damage to all non-villain targets

back.text: At the end of the villain turn, the villain target with the lowest HP regains 1 HP

small.p: Whenever Crawler is dealt damage, he becomes immune to that damage type until the next time he takes damage.
The first time an Attack card would enter the trash each turn, this card deals 2 toxic damage and 2 melee damage to the non-villain target with the highest HP.
The first time a Special card would enter the trash each turn, Crawler regains 30 HP

back.text: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP

text.p: The first time a Special card would enter the trash each turn, destroy all environment cards then Burnscar deals X fire damage to all non-villain targets, where X = 1 + the number of environment cards destroyed in this way

back.text: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 1 fire damage to all non-villain targets

text.p: Reduce damage dealt to Mannequin by 1.
The first time a Defence card would enter the trash each turn, destroy 1 hero Ongoing or Equipment card

back.text: Reduce damage dealt to the villain target with the lowest HP by 1

text.p: The first time an Attack card would enter the trash each turn, Shatterbird deals 2 projectile damage to the H - 1 hero targets with the highest HP

back.text: At the end of the villain turn this card deals 1 projectile damage to all non-villain targets

text.p: All villain targets other than the Siberian are immune to damage

back.text: The villain target with the lowest HP is immune to melee damage

text.p: The first time a Defence card would enter the trash each turn, the hero with the most cards in hand discards 2 cards.
Whenever Cherish would be dealt damage, Cherish deals 2 psychic damage to the target damaging her

back.text: Whenever a target is destroyed during a hero's turn, that hero deals themselves 1 psychic damage

card.name: Murder Rat
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, Murder Rat deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP

card.name: Spiderbots
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, deal X damage to the hero target with the lowest HP, where X = 1 + the number of Spiderbots in play

card.name: They're All Better Now
card.text: Flip the most recently defeated Nine card; they have 10 HP. If no cards are flipped in this way, play the top card of the villain deck

card.name: The Scream
card.text: Each hero may destroy any number of Equipment cards. Then each hero target takes X projectile damage, where X = 2 * the number of Equipment cards in play

card.name: Some Light Entertainment
card.text: Each villain target in play deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the highest HP

card.name: Legend
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1

card.name: Less Than Human
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1

card.name: Some More Friends
card.text: Play the top card of the Nine deck. Play the top card of the villain deck

card.name: Shall We Play a Game?
card.text: If Jack Slash is not in play, find Jack Slash in the Nine deck and put him into play. Jack Slash deals 2 psychic damage to all hero targets

card.name: Change the Rules
card.text: Shuffle all Nine cards in play back into the Nine deck. Deal X Nine cards from the top of the Nine deck, where X = 1 + the number of Nine cards that were in play

card.name: We Don't Take Prisoners
card.text: Whenever a target is destroyed by a villain card, remove it from the game
